Understanding Token Budgets

By Jane Doe

Token budgets help control the cost of LLM interactions. By limiting the number of tokens sent to the model, developers can reduce expenses while maintaining quality.

This article explores the best practices for implementing token budgets in AI applications. We will cover estimation techniques, truncation strategies, and real-world examples.

Estimation Techniques

The simplest approach is to use character-based estimation, where roughly 4 characters equal one token. More accurate methods use actual tokenizer libraries.
